analyzed: chachakkasūtra

original: \\\++ādhyātmikam āyatanaṁ tac ca bhagavatā uddiṣṭam avibhaktaṁ \\\
analyzed: ādhyātmikam āyatanam tat ca bhagavatā uddiṣṭam avibhaktam

arūpam a nidarśanam a pratigham
verso
āyatanam catvāri
sa pratigham yathā śabdaḥ evam

original: \\\++ sapratighaṁ ucyate bhadaṁta dharmā bāhyam āyatanam ++\\\
analyzed: sa pratigham ucyate bhadata dharmāḥ bāhyam āyatanam

original: \\\sarvaṁ ca sarvam astīti sarvadharmāmś ca pṛcchati brahmaṇo bhikṣu \\\
analyzed: sarvam ca sarvam asti iti sarva dharmān ca pṛcchati brahmaṇaḥ bhikṣu

original: \\\+ / ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni katamāni ṣaṭ rūpaṁ bāhyam. ++\\\

original: eno89_3 \\\ dharmāṁś ca pṛcchati brāhmaṇo bhikṣur ānandaḥ śāstā bhikṣu u +++
analyzed: dharmāḥ ca pṛcchati brāhmaṇaḥ bhikṣuḥ ānandaḥ śāstā bhikṣu

original: \\\? ṭ cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanaṁ śrotraṁ ghrānaṁ jihvā kāyo +\\\
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādhyātmikam āyatanam śrotram ghrānam jihvā

original: \\\? bdo rasaḥ spraṣṭavyo dharmo bāhyam āyatanam // ṣaḍ vijñāṇa \\\
analyzed: bdaḥ rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaḥ dharmaḥ bāhyam āyatanam
tame ṣaṭ cakṣuḥ sa sparśaḥ śrotram ghāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ

original: \\\ saṁsparśajā vedanā // ṣaḍ ime saṁjñākāyāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣu +\\\

original: \\\? ṣṭavyāvekṣaḥ dharmāvekṣa // ṣaḍ imāni cetakhilaṁ mṛkṣa + \\\
analyzed: dharma avekṣa ṣaḍ imāni ceta khilam

original: \\\? dharmāḥ sāsravāḥ sopādānīyāḥ cetaḥkhilaṁ mrakṣa vastu\\\
analyzed: dharmāḥ sa āsravāḥ sa upādānīyāḥ cetaḥ khilam mrakṣa vastu

original: \\\? stunā // cakṣur bhikṣavaḥ anityam atītam anāgataṁ kaḥ \\\
analyzed: stunā cakṣuḥ bhikṣavaḥ anityam atītam anāgatam kaḥ

original: \\\ nandati pratyupannasya cakṣuṣo nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya\\\
